title: 1 BED 1 BATH IN THE HEART OF MIDTOWN WILL GO FAST
posting_body: THIS 1 BED 1 BATH IS LOCATED IN THE HEART OF MIDTOWN.
A LOT OF DEMAND FOR THIS UNIT DO MISS OUT ON THIS ONE!
GEOTHERMAL UTILITIES, ROOF TOP ACCESS, LAUNDRY ON EVERY FLOOR.
SAFE, SECURE, WALKABLE TO THE DMC, WAYNE STATE AND EVERYTHING ELSE MIDTOWN HAS TO OFFER.SERIOUS INQUIREIES ONLY.
CALL TODAY TO SCHEDULE A TOUR @
